title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery      Â                 Theodore Roosevelt's Western Travel   12 Photos  View photographs of Theodore Roosevelt's 1903 campaign tour of the western United States.          Old Orchard   7 Photos  Theodore Roosevelt Jr's home at Sagamore Hill          Theodore Roosevelt at Sagamore Hill   11 Photos  This gallery contains photographs of Theodore Roosevelt and his family enjoying the grounds at Sagamore Hill.            Historic Objects   12 Photos  View photographs of historic objects in the collection of Sagamore Hill National Historic Site.          Sagamore Hill Beach   5 Photos            Birds Eye View of Sagamore Hill   1 Photos  This image is intended to show Sagamore Hill as it looked in the last years of TR's life. It was created by the Harpers Ferry Center, National Park Service.            The Roosevelts and World War 1   15 Photos  A group of World War 1 related artifacts belonging to Theodore Roosevelt's family.          Theodore Roosevelt's Home   3 Photos  Photographs of Theodore Roosevelt's Home after the completion of the three year rehabilitation
